title: 97/871/EC: Commission Decision of 16 December 1997 amending Decision 97/467/EC on drawing up provisional lists of third-country establishments from which the Member States authorize imports of rabbit meat and farmed game meat (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 16 December 1997 amending Decision 97/467/EC on drawing up provisional lists of third-country establishments from which the Member States authorize imports of rabbit meat and farmed game meat (Text with EEA relevance) (97/871/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to this Decision is added to the Annex of Decision 97/467/EC.
This Decision shall apply from 1 January 1998.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 December 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 243, 11. 10. 1995, p. 17.
(2) OJ L 13, 16. 1. 1997, p. 33.
(3) OJ L 199, 26. 7. 1997, p. 57.
(4) See page 43 of this Official Journal.
ANNEX
